      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private java.lang.String clearFix​(java.io.StringWriter rawXml)
      First checks Locus artifacts as the ">\t" regexp (or '\\s*>\\s*' within original kml) as Locus may spread those signs ">" occasionally (especially after <ExtendedData> tag).
      private java.io.InputStream fixNamespaceForLcPrefixMethod​(java.io.InputStream xmlInputStream)
      This happens when: kml.contains("<lc:attachment>") && (!kml.contains("<ExtendedData xmlns:lc=\"http://www.locusmap.eu\">") || !kml.contains("<lc:attachment xmlns:lc=\"http://www.locusmap.eu\">") || !kml.contains("xmlns:lc="http://www.locusmap.eu"")) A really stupid quickfix for GoogleEarth reproducing without Locus specific prefix "lc" with corresponding namespace for the following tags
      private java.io.InputStream fixXsiSchemaLocationAttributeMethod​(java.io.InputStream xmlInputStream)
      This happens when: kml.contains(<Document xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/kml/2.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/kml/2.2.0/ogckml22.xsd">) && !kmlHeader.contains("xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance") for bounding that namespace A really stupid quickfix for GoogleEarth reproducing Document xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/kml/2.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/kml/2.2.0/ogckml22.xsd" without bounding that namespace.
      protected java.lang.String getAsString​(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
      Quick and simple transformation of a given Document to a String without any setting, as it.

      • processXml

        public abstract java.lang.String processXml​(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                            MultipartDto multipartDto)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                            org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                            javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        DocumentBuilderFactory.setNamespaceAware(boolean) true is crucial for getting Node.getLocalName()!
        Parameters:
        inputStream - An xml file (kml, gpx etc) as the InputStream from a given MultipartDto
        multipartDto - The main object to get data from.
        Returns:
        A fully processed xml string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getAsString

        protected java.lang.String getAsString​(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Quick and simple transformation of a given Document to a String without any setting, as it.
        Parameters:
        document -
        Returns:
        A raw String without any optimizations, settings, crearFixing etc.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • writeTransformedDocument

        protected java.lang.String writeTransformedDocument​(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                                    boolean prettyPrint)
                                             throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Parameters:
        document - Document to be transformed into String.
        prettyPrint - To format the resulting xml String with indents.
        Returns:
        String where 1) All Transformer linebreaks as "\r\n" are replaced with default "\n" 2) As Locus may spread orphan signs ">" occasionally (especially after <ExtendedData> tag) before returning the resulting String is checked with ">\t" regexp (or '\\s*>\\s*' within original kml for those signs to be deleted.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - When xml is not valid

      • fixNamespaceForLcPrefixMethod

        private java.io.InputStream fixNamespaceForLcPrefixMethod​(java.io.InputStream xmlInputStream)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        This happens when: kml.contains("<lc:attachment>") && (!kml.contains("<ExtendedData xmlns:lc=\"http://www.locusmap.eu\">") || !kml.contains("<lc:attachment xmlns:lc=\"http://www.locusmap.eu\">") || !kml.contains("xmlns:lc="http://www.locusmap.eu"")) A really stupid quickfix for GoogleEarth reproducing without Locus specific prefix "lc" with corresponding namespace for the following tags
        Parameters:
        xmlInputStream - Initial InputStream with malformed .kml
        Returns:
        .kml String as InputStream with the in the header.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • fixXsiSchemaLocationAttributeMethod

        private java.io.InputStream fixXsiSchemaLocationAttributeMethod​(java.io.InputStream xmlInputStream)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        This happens when: kml.contains(<Document xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/kml/2.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/kml/2.2.0/ogckml22.xsd">) && !kmlHeader.contains("xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance") for bounding that namespace A really stupid quickfix for GoogleEarth reproducing Document xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/kml/2.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/kml/2.2.0/ogckml22.xsd" without bounding that namespace.
        Parameters:
        xmlInputStream - Initial InputStream with malformed .kml
        Returns:
        .kml String as InputStream with the in the header.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • trimWhitespaces

        void trimWhitespaces​(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Deletes all whitespaces between all nodes deep recursively from the given Node
        Parameters:
        node - The root Node whose all the children should be cleared from whitespaces between

      • trimWhitespaces

        void trimWhitespaces​(org.w3c.dom.Document document)

      • clearFix

        private java.lang.String clearFix​(java.io.StringWriter rawXml)
        First checks Locus artifacts as the ">\t" regexp (or '\\s*>\\s*' within original kml) as Locus may spread those signs ">" occasionally (especially after <ExtendedData> tag). Second replaces all the Transformer's "\r\n" indents with standard "\r"
        Parameters:
        rawXml - A newly transformed raw Xml.
        Returns:
        The cleared xml String.

      • validateDocument

                         throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
